testimonials.title: What people say
testimonials.subtitle: From actual travelers who've done this

reviews.quote: Had 8 hours in Paris between flights to Tokyo. Instead of sleeping on airport chairs, I saw the Eiffel Tower and ate actual French food. Got back with an hour to spare.
reviews.author: Sarah K.

reviews.quote: My company books weird connecting flights to save money. This made my 10-hour Chicago layover actually enjoyable. Did the architecture boat tour and deep dish pizza.
reviews.author: Marcus T.

reviews.quote: Had a 12-hour overnight layover in Frankfurt. Thought I'd just sleep in the airport, but they got me a walking tour and dinner in the old town. Way better than airport food.
reviews.author: Priya M.

features.title: How we make it work
features.subtitle: The practical stuff that makes layover tours actually doable

items.title: We do the math on timing
items.description: Immigration lines, transport time, getting back through security - we factor it all in so you don't stress

items.title: Locals know what's good

items.title: We watch your flight

items.title: Leave your bags behind

items.title: Solo or with others

items.title: Works on your phone
